programme.title: Shark Warning!
programme.desc: A man returns home 20 years after his brother was killed by a shark. Seeking closure, he's drawn back into terror as the shark strikes again. With more deaths mounting, he realizes he must face the predator and end the nightmare once and for all.

programme.title: Shark Week
programme.desc: A group of complete strangers find themselves isolated by a wealthy madman on his island compound.

programme.title: Shark Warning!
programme.desc: A man returns home 20 years after his brother was killed by a shark. Seeking closure, he's drawn back into terror as the shark strikes again. With more deaths mounting, he realizes he must face the predator and end the nightmare once and for all.

programme.title: Ice Sharks
programme.desc: As scientists study the effects of climate change on marine life under Arctic ice, a new breed of shark breaks through, forcing the scientists to fight back.

programme.title: 5-Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: A beautiful island's aquatic life faces a new terror: the 5-Headed Shark, a demented starfish-shaped monster threatening Puerto Rico's beaches

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: A battle between two prehistoric sea creatures endangers the California coast.

programme.title: 6-Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: What is supposed to be a marriage boot camp on a remote island turns into the ultimate test for survival when a 6-headed shark starts attacking the beach. Trapped with minimal weapons, they discover that no one is safe in the water or on land.

programme.title: Sharknado: Feeding Frenzy
programme.desc: What began as another Syfy creature feature has now become an important piece of pop culture - poised to take over the entire world.

programme.title: Mega Shark Vs Kolossus
programme.desc: Humanity is threatened when a robot is accidentally awakened at the same time as another mega shark.

programme.title: 2-Headed Shark Attack
programme.desc: Survivors of a ship that sunk during their semester at sea try to escape from a two-headed shark.

programme.title: Megalodon Rising
programme.desc: When history's greatest aquatic predator returns, the armada of modern warships sent to destroy it has no chance at all.

programme.title: Sharknado 2: The Second One
programme.desc: When a Category 7 hurricane pummels New York, the surging flood waters bring thousands of sharks. To make matters worse, tornadoes soon dot the horizon. As Sharknadoes tear through the city, no vehicle, building, or national monument is safe.
